definition: to pat/to slap/(of a bird) to flap (one's wings)
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: The breaking surf on the reef is mesmerizing.
sentences.chinese: 拍打在礁石上浪濤聲催人入夢。

sentences.english: Griffins now sometimes glide rather than always flapping their wings.
sentences.chinese: 新來者現在有時滑動不願總是拍打他們的翅膀。

sentences.english: It was getting darker. The rain was beating on the windows. The wind was rising.
sentences.chinese: 天正慢慢黑下來，大雨拍打着窗子，外面開始起風了。

sentences.english: Another fell away, shaken loose by the beating of his wings.
sentences.chinese: 另外一支在龍翼的拍打下脫落下來。

sentences.english: We could hear the swish and gurgle of water against the hull.
sentences.chinese: 我們能聽到水拍打船體時的嘩嘩聲。

sentences.english: Give the unprogressive and acing imposing the rhythm The sex massage of tap the function .
sentences.chinese: 給頑固的痠疼處以節奏性按摩的拍打機能。

sentences.english: Snowflakes were patting against the windowpane.
sentences.chinese: 雪花輕輕拍打着玻璃窗。

sentences.english: Wet a piece of cotton with the lotion then apply to skin with gentle patting motions.
sentences.chinese: 將一塊棉花弄溼，然後塗在肌膚上輕輕拍打。

sentences.english: Rain rattles the roof and thutters at the window.
sentences.chinese: 雨點落在地面上，拍打着窗戶。

sentences.english: The waves bathed the sunny shores.
The wind flapped in his face and his eyes were flashing.
sentences.chinese: 風拍打着他的臉，他的眼睛閃閃發光。

sentences.english: Murky brown water grows to roof tops and lapped around the high-rises.
sentences.chinese: 渾濁的棕色河水已經升到屋頂，拍打着高樓大廈。

sentences.english: She didn't care the ribbon slatting her face.
sentences.chinese: 她根本沒有感到飄帶在拍打她的臉。

sentences.english: He bowed his head and his long, red tail started thumping the ground.
sentences.chinese: 它彎下腦袋，紅色的長尾巴開始拍打地面。

sentences.english: With a WHOOSH and the crack of mighty wings, JAKE RETURNS.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨着呼呼聲和強健巨翼拍打的噼啪聲，傑克回來了。

sentences.english: Babbitt sat on the stump , facing the dark pond, slapping mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 巴比特面對黑暗的池塘坐在樹樁上，不時拍打蚊子。

definition: to shake/to fling one's arm/to lash/to swing
to gently caress and stroke/to pet/to fondle
